captions.text: (opening staring match)
My eyes are dry
Sandara Park OUT!

I'm squinting.. I just closed my eyes
(Minzy OUT!)
Bring it on
(Park Bom OUT!)
Did I win?

(Staring match winner CL's opening START!)
Hello, Ask In A Box fans
Nice to meet you
We're back with our 2nd regular album after 4 years
We prepared a lot, right?

CL took part in composing and writing
five songs from this album

Sandara, I heard that the title song
'Come Back Home' is really good
Of course, it has our unique style to it
I hope many of you love it

Now that we've come back home
we prepared special time with you guys

We will answer the questions sent by
our fans around the world through SNS
Let's start!!
Fans across the globe ask 2NE1!
How come you decided to release double title track album?
I'm not sure
Because the songs are nice

The album is named by YG to give
a strong image to our comeback

Actually, the title song was not
'Come Back Home' at first
It was added to the track lastly
It was when he was in Seo Taiji and Boys

and when he made his first choreography
for their song 'Come Back Home'

So as the four daughters,
we decided to make it our title song
Double title songs are not enough for me
Every single song can be title song
What's the costume concept for the new song?
All four of us came back with street fashion

I guess that's why we are kind of fresh
just like when we fisrt debuted
We are doing the pose from those days
and this Half and half hair
I love chicken and I was inspired by chicken
Just like seasoned chicken half and fried chicken half
Half bobbed hair and half long hair

I have red hair and red jacket
It's punk style

Lion, tiger, leopard.. all the wild animals
living in a jungle.. I'm the queen among them

I'm back with black hair
Clean... white face

Among 2NE1 members, I'm the one with
image of purity and innocence
Each of us has unique individuality

What did you think when you first saw
the choreography made by YG?
Wow, when are we going to memorize this?

We started at midnight and finished at 3
It took us three hours to master
I got compliments

The dance is very addictive
It's very different and unique

You won't be able to forget it
At some point, you guys will be dancing, too
Key word?
Come in! Because it's come back home
That's it!
Can each of you sing us your favorite song in this album?
It's really hard to pick one, honestly

But I will pick 'Nice Girl'
because I empathize with the lyrics
Nice girl~
That was too long! too much!!
Don't you empathize with the lyrics?
I will pick 'Gotta Be You'
It has to be you
My favorite is 'Mental Breakdown' which is my solo
Sing it for us
No! not this one
Not even one letter?
Men! that's it
My favorite is 'Come Back Home'
Come back.. that's it
That was too long!
If you could be a superhero, what super power would you want?
I wish I can teleport
I think I will be able to do more things If I can teleport
I wish I can be invisible
She's a pervert

What are you going to do?
Are you going to go to public bath house?
It's so obvious
What is the best dish at the YG dining hall?
I think it's kimchi

All the famous restaurants have the best kimchi
so I picked kimchi
I like stir fried spicy port and bean paste stew
Recently, I had two bowls of rice with the stew
Bean paste stew is really good

I asked her if I can have more rice and
she said 'You eat more than I thought'
She brought more rice for me
She does eat more than what we think
I heard that she is from Jeollado
All the side dishes are really delicious
I'm hungry
Which member has weird or interesting habits?
I'm not sure because everyone is weird
Shall I start with what I have observed?
Minzy has one when she takes selfies
I think I know what it is
Let's count 1, 2, 3 and do it together
One, two, three!
Everyone can imitate me
Bom has one with her hands
She talks with this hand gesture
It's because my hands are too flexible
Fans across the globe ask each member of 2NE1!

Does ramyon(instant noodles) made by
Bom really taste that good?
There's something different even with the same ramyon
Dara loves ramyon but Minzy and I rarely have it
but we got addicted to Bom's ramyon
I make them even though it bothers me sometimes

They never look for me but when they call out for me,
it's always "Can you make us ramyon?"
So I make ramyon for them
We were very touched
Is there anything that you want to do in life other than music?
I want to be someone's wife and have a baby
Do it later
Other than that, I don't really want another job or anything
Is there a certain commercial that you would like to try?
I'm really good at driving so many be a car commercial?
I'm so good at parking, right guys?
They were surprised when I parked my car
(silence)
Minzy! Are you still into collecting Gundam figures?
Now it has changed
I collect RC cars now
I was hit by them
I once hit Dara's foot with RC cars
But you still have Gundam figures
I donated them
To the people who really Gundam figures but who can't afford them
Fans across the globe that sent us questions, Thank you!!!
There are many good songs on this album
Please support us!

Until now, this was 2NE1's Ask In A Box!
Thank you

title: ASK IN A BOX: 2NE1(투애니원) _ Come Back Home(컴백홈) & Gotta Be You(너 아님 안돼) [ENG/JPN/CHN SUB]

comments.text: ah..ok..tnx much for this info :)
comments.author: Angela Hinautan

comments.text:
1theK is just a video distribution company in Korea where they help 
distribute all kinds of videos related to Korean entertainment:  like K-POP 
MVs, idol group interviews, short variety shows, k-dramas, etc.  It's not 
affiliated with YG.  1theK (formerly LOENT) is an independent franchise 
business.
